auth.already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up

map.click_markers_details: Click on markers to view station details

alerts.alerts_checked_every_5_minutes: Alerts are checked every 5 minutes automatically
alerts.one_alert_per_city_6_hours: You'll only receive one alert per city every 6 hours
alerts.recommended_threshold_150: Recommended threshold: 150 AQI for general population
alerts.threshold_100_respiratory: Set to 100 AQI if you have respiratory conditions
alerts.notifications_enabled: Notifications are enabled. You will receive alerts even when the app is closed.
alerts.notifications_disabled: Enable notifications to get alerts when AQI exceeds your threshold.

health.good_air_quality: Air quality is good. Perfect for outdoor activities!
health.moderate_air_quality: Air quality is acceptable. Enjoy outdoor activities.
health.sensitive_groups_warning: Sensitive groups should reduce prolonged outdoor exposure.
health.reduce_outdoor_activities: Everyone should reduce outdoor activities. Consider masks if outside.
health.avoid_outdoor_activities: Avoid outdoor activities. Use air purifiers indoors.
health.emergency_conditions: Emergency conditions. Stay indoors with windows closed.
